title: The Warmth of Your Hands
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Haah, there are only 2 days left this year, huh~. It’s truly going to end with a live, isn’t it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>To be able to do a live right at the very end is just the best, right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, that’s right. Let’s do our best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, wait, your hair.... There’s a little bit stuck on your lip. Can I get it for you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Oh, yeah. Thank you.... Cold-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wah, s-, sorry! I have cold hands.... My bad<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Not at all! I was just a little surprised.... I’m also sorry, okay? Isn’t it painful for your hands to be that cold? Here, lend me your hands<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>S-, so warm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, isn’t it? The coldness of your hand may partly be because you’re nervous. It’s okay. I’m here for you, and so the rest of Aqours too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>O-, of course I know that! But, umm.... Thank you, Riko<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
